long_description: Lace up your boots and sample 40 of the finest trails Massachusetts has to offer. Author: Benjamin B. Ames. Softcover; 214 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Globe Pequot Press; copyright 2002. Detailed route maps for each trail and accurate route profiles showing the ups and downs of each hike. Accurate directions, difficulty ratings, trail contacts and more. Tips on equipment, trip planning, and hiking with dogs and children.
short_description: Lace up your boots and sample 40 of the finest trails Massachusetts has to offer.
